mapper.insert: merge into cart using dual on (product_seq = ${productSeq} and size_seq = ${sizeSeq}) when matched then update set cartstock = ${cartStock} when not matched then insert(seq, product_seq, cartstock, size_seq) values(cart_sequence.nextVal, ${productSeq}, ${cartStock}, ${sizeSeq})
mapper.select: select c.seq, p.name as productName, s.size_name as sizeName, to_char(p.price, '999,999,999,999') as price , c.cartstock as quantity, to_char(sum(p.price * c.cartstock)/count(c.seq), '999,999,999,999') as totalPrice ,p.image from cart c, product p, goods g, size_tbl s where c.product_seq = p.seq and s.seq = c.size_seq group by c.seq, p.name, p.price, c.cartstock, s.size_name, p.image
select to_char(sum(p.price * c.cartstock) , '999,999,999,999') as totalPrice from cart c, product p, size_tbl s where c.product_seq = p.seq and s.seq = c.size_seq
